Author(s): Bruner, E. M.

Annotation: Explores how experience and narrative structure meaning within cultures.

Annotation: Foundational theory on culture as a system of symbols and meaning.

Annotation: Introduces the concept of narrative transportation and its psychological effects.
Label: Experimental; Narrative; Psychology

Author(s): Ochs, E., & Capps, L.
Title: Living Narrative: Creating Lives in Everyday Storytelling
Annotation: Examines how storytelling constructs identity in everyday contexts.

Author(s): Ong, W. J.
Title: Orality and Literacy: The Technologizing of the Word
Annotation: Classic study on how technology transforms modes of human expression.

Author(s): Vansina, J.
Title: Oral Tradition as History
Annotation: Analyzes oral storytelling as a form of historical record keeping.
Label: Anthropology; Oral History; Narrative

Author(s): Van Laer, T., De Ruyter, K., Visconti, L. M., & Wetzels, M.

Author(s): Chow, J. Y. L., Colagiuri, B., Rottman, B. M., Goldwater, M., & Livesey, E. J.

Author(s): Friedman, S., & Goldwater, M.

Author(s): LaCour, M., Hughes, B., Goldwater, M., Ireland, M., Worthy, D., Van Allen, J., ... & Davis, T.
